It’s slang for homosexuals not a slur, why are you trying to educate me about my language/culture? You can google the meaning all you want but you don’t understand .

What is a slur but offensive slang? I'm trying to educate you on the words you're using. Most slurs jump cultural lines as people find new ways to voice their perceived superiority over minorities, whether that be from skin color, religion, orientation, or gender. Just because it's from your culture doesn't mean it isn't offensive. I grew up around people saying the N word offensively, the type to consider the rebel flag part of their culture. A culture of supressiving black people for centuries. Because their ancestors said it, does that make it any better?

Cheek Mill

>My English teacher wanted to have sex in junior high The only problem was my English teacher was a guy

This isn’t actually the version that appeared on the album when it was first released, rather its the first revision, the version that was released for the single. Which is why it breaks the flow and sounds clunky.

>My English teacher wanted to flunk me in junior high Thanks a lot, next semester I’ll be 35

And this was the radio version of the single. 

The original version that featured on the album when it was released was this

>My English teacher wanted to fuck me in junior high The only problem was my English teacher was a guy
